description:
A unique and high-performance browser produced by Lenovo

Lenovo Browser (formerly known as Smart Lenovo Browser) is a unique and high-performance browser produced by Lenovo. It is developed based on Chromium kernel with Lenovo's years of hardware & software strength. It is faster, lighter and more secure! Lenovo Browser will renew your browsing experience. The new refreshing interactive design will be your intimate assistant to make your life, entertainment and office more organized. Enjoy your fast browsing, refreshing reading, safe online shopping and other easy and cozy surfing experience.
